item.title: Delirium
item.description: Acute and fluctuating disturbance in attention and awareness Often reversible Collateral history may be very useful - if patient has capacity patient needs to consent for the collateral history to be taken.

item.title: osteoporosis
item.description: Reduced bone mass Primary - age related Secondary - to another condition or drug If trabecular bone is affected, crush fractures of vertebrae are common.
